name: Undercover Surveillance
description: Training in covert observation, intelligence gathering, and tailing suspects without detection.

cards.title: Shadowing & Tail Techniques
cards.description: Following a target without raising suspicion.
bulletpoints: Use multiple observers to avoid detection
Blend into urban and rural environments
cards.summaryText: Conduct discreet shadowing operations by varying distance and pace, rotating observers to break patterns, and blending into urban or rural backdrops so targets never sense persistent surveillance during extended operations.

cards.title: Electronic Surveillance Basics
cards.description: Using high-tech methods to track and monitor targets remotely.
bulletpoints: Use encrypted channels for secure data transmission
cards.summaryText: Execute covert electronic surveillance by planting low-profile sensors, mapping movement patterns in real time, and relaying encrypted intelligence to command so remote monitoring stays invisible.
